evidence.text: No monitor was appointed in this case (confirmed by absence of monitor references across all documents), making monitor reports inapplicable. Settlement was finalized without monitor requirements (Docket #181, Order STAYING CASE).

All fully visited documents (including docket entries, complaints, orders, and settlement motions) contain no references to any court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor for this case. The case terminated via settlement without monitor appointment (Docket #181, Order STAYING CASE granting Joint MOTION to Stay Proceedings pending finalization of Settlement).
